generated_content.title: Paranormal Mysteries in Salem, Massachusetts - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Step into the eerie atmosphere of Salem, where the infamous Salem Witch Trials took place in 1692. Explore the haunted sites, including the Salem Witch Museum and the House of the Seven Gables, and experience the city's dark history for yourself.
